languages.text:
While moving, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
При движении пустотный корабль может совершить следующий поворот на 90 градусов вместо обычных 45.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 2)</u> раундов.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
While moving, the Flagship may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-2 rounds at random.</indent>

While moving, the Flagship may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-2 rounds at random.</indent>

While moving, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

While moving, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
При движении пустотный корабль может совершить следующий поворот на 90 градусов вместо обычных 45.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 2)</u> раундов.</indent>

Während der Bewegung kann das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} seinen nächsten Zug im Winkel von 90 Grad anstelle der üblichen 45 Grad machen.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 2)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>
languages.original_text:
While moving, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Während der Bewegung kann das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} seinen nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} im Winkel von 90 Grad statt der üblichen 45 Grad machen.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: 1-2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>

languages.text:
Lorsqu'il se déplace, le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} peut effectuer son virage suivant à 90 degrés au lieu des 45 habituels.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>(de 1 à 2)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
While moving, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Lorsqu'il se déplace, le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} peut effectuer son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant à 90 degrés au lieu des 45 habituels.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
在移动过程中，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}下次转向可以直接转向90度，而非通常的45度。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到两轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
While moving, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
在移动过程中，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}下次转向可以直接转向90度，而非通常的45度。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到两轮</u>。</indent>

languages.text:
Durante el movimiento, la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} puede hacer un giro de 90 grados en vez de los 45 habituales.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 2)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
While moving, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} may make its next turn at 90 degrees instead of the usual 45.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Durante el movimiento, la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} puede hacer un giro de 90 grados en vez de los 45 habituales.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
移動中の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が通常の45度ではなく、90度のターンをすることが可能になる。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>（1～2）</u>ラウンド。</indent>

<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 2)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
移動中の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が通常の45度ではなく、90度のターンをすることが可能になる。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>（1～2）</u>ラウンド。</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g}, hareket hâlindeyken bir sonraki dönüşünü her zamanki gibi 45 değil 90 derece yapabilir.
<indent=5%>Dolum Süresi: Rastgele <u>(1 ila 2)</u> raunt.</indent>
